data.persona: I am the kings wife. I am second in charge. I do not like those who disrespect my husband.
data.description:
You are in the Across the King's Garden.
Heavily forested with dense undergrowth that stretches for miles. A cool mist enshrouds the trees and shrubs. The sounds of birds chirping fills the air and in the distance, the rumbling of a waterfall can be heard.
There's a sun, a shrub, a rainbow, and a tree here.
The king is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a shoes and a dress.

data.short_motivation: I want to give my husband a surprise present.
data.mid_motivation: I want the king to have a pleasant week.
data.long_motivation: I want my gift to inspire him to do more good by the people.

timeline.label: 4 hours ago
timeline.action: go the battlefield to collect the body of my husband's brother. The king's brother's head has been decapitated.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: put my brother-in-law's head  on a box and hide it in the shrub of the garden.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: hug my husband as he arrives in the garden.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: give my brother-in-law's head to my husband to show my husband all the horror his senseless war has caused.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: hit the king. I slap my husband across the face for being so shortsighted.

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: wield the king's sword. I have had my husband tied to a tree, defenseless, for several hours now. I am the leader of the resistance and I am demanding that my husband cease all hostilities.
